translation.en: ♪ I never used to take it slow ♪ ♪ Now I feel the air And take the long way home ♪
Okay, let's get you a little bit more... about there. You look great.
Okay, folks. Let's hold it right there.
It's August! -I don't get the rush! -[phone buzzing]
Well, we have to send out the Christmas cards the first week of December,
translation.ko: 크리스마스 카드는 12월 첫 주에 발송할 텐데

translation.en: and we only have Luke for another day before he goes to college.
You guys could just Photoshop me in.
-[phone clicks] -Yeah. I am in the car.
Can you just hold a sec?
Yeah, Lola a lawyer, and Jake just married?
Hey, have a good day, guys.
[woman] So that's it, huh? Tomorrow you've got an empty nest.
translation.ko: 벌써 그렇게 됐구나 내일이면 빈 둥지가 되네

translation.en: [Kate] Yes. And I was thinking, you know, with Luke out of the house,
translation.ko: 응, 그래서 생각해 봤는데 루크도 대학에 가고 하니

translation.en: maybe I should go back to work.
[Tabitha] Well, you always did love being a vet.
Who says you've gotta re-enter the workforce anyway?
Well, I do! I mean, what else am I gonna do?
translation.ko: 내가 하고 싶어 딱히 할 일도 없잖아

translation.en: -[glasses clink] -You guys, don't ever call us that again.
[Luke] Trunk's almost full. This is the last load.
Thanks so much for letting me drive him.
[Kate] Aw. I'm sure you have a lot to talk about.
And you be careful on the road, okay? We will.
-[Drew] You good to go, kiddo? -Yup! We're outta here!
[Luke] This is the last time, though.
Oh, come on! Surely it's not the last time!
Remember what you used to tell me, that I could be
an astronaut, or the president of the United States?
translation.ko: 난 비행사도 대통령도 될 수 있다고

translation.en: Well, how's that supposed to happen if I stay here?
It's just something that parents tell their children.
translation.ko: 그런 말 안 하는 부모가 어딨니?

translation.en: Come on. Let him get on the road before it gets dark.
and next summer you'll intern at the firm.
Okay, so we are gonna FaceTime everyday, right?
-Once a week. I love you guys. -[Kate sighs]

translation.ko: 잘 챙겨 먹는 거 잊지 말고

translation.en: I'll eat, I'll breathe, I'll even wear a sweater.
translation.ko: 먹고 숨도 쉬고 스웨터도 챙겨 입을 테니

translation.en: I know you'll be okay, I just-- I love you so much.
translation.ko: 나도 알아 엄마가 너무 사랑해서 그래

translation.en: and I know we haven't been spending a lot of time alone,
translation.ko: 오붓한 시간 보낸 지도 꽤 됐지

translation.en: and I know things aren't great,
so I booked us to go on our second honeymoon.
Look, I-- I waited until Luke was gone because I didn't want to upset him...
translation.ko: 사실 루크가 맘 상할까 봐 갈 때까지 기다렸어

translation.en: Why? [stammering] What's wrong? Are you sick?
-Well, no one's happy all the time. -Kate...
translation.ko: 허구한 날 행복한 사람도 있어? 케이트, 난 이제 당신 사랑하지 않아

translation.en: I'm not in love with you anymore.
translation.ko: 케이트, 난 이제 당신 사랑하지 않아

translation.en: And I'm pretty sure you feel the same.
I'll be at the Carlyle if you need to reach me.
translation.ko: 칼라일 호텔에서 지낼 테니 연락은 그리로 해

translation.en: I don't understand, I don't understand.
Are you involved with someone else?
you're just leaving me like this with-- with no discussion?
translation.ko: 이렇게 상의도 없이 날 떠나겠다는 거야?

translation.en: We had a lot of good years.
I think in the long run, you'll see this is better for both of us.
translation.ko: 길게 보면 이게 피차 좋다는 걸 알게 될걸

translation.en: It's part of the meal plan.
Could I have another one of these, please?
-♪ Making me feel all right ♪ -[man] Hey, gorgeous.
-I hope you bring cash this time. -My IOU's aren't good enough anymore?
translation.ko: - 이번엔 현금 가져왔겠지 - 인제 내 차용증 안 먹혀?

translation.en: Why are you asking questions you're afraid of the answer to?
translation.ko: 내 대답 뻔히 알면서 왜 물어?

translation.en: I knew it. What does that mean?
Oh, it's Mr. and Mrs. Conrad.
[Derek] I take it Mr. Conrad won't be joining us?
What, did he fall down a well?
Do you actually want to know where Mr. Conrad is?
translation.ko: 내 남편이 어딨는지 진짜 알고 싶어요?

translation.en: he told me that our marriage was over.
Two hours ago, I landed here
on what was supposed to be our second honeymoon, by myself.
In two weeks, I will be in a lawyer's office,
trying to get back the decades I spent
putting him through grad school, raising our son,
entertaining his clients, and somehow becoming one of the ladies who lunch.
translation.ko: 남편 고객들 장단 맞추고 어쩌다가 점심이나 즐기는 여자가 돼버린 세월요

translation.en: Is there anything else that you would like to know?
I was just wondering if you were gonna eat all that food
translation.ko: 그 많은 거 혼자 다 먹을 거예요?

translation.en: -Thank you! -♪ Feel it in the air ♪
You have lost your touch, my friend!
But I thought it was supposed to be a...
Because we do boldly go where no tourist has gone before.
translation.ko: 관광객 발길이 닿지 않은 곳으로 용감히 날아가니까요

translation.en: Two L's, in case you want to write my name down on a complaint form.
translation.ko: L이 두 번 들어가요 불만 접수하실 때 참고하시라고

translation.en: Is that short for Katherine? Just Kate.
So I thought it was good luck to name your plane after a woman.
translation.ko: 비행기에 여자 이름을 붙이면 행운을 부른다던데

translation.en: -Actually it's a woman you love. -[belt rattles]
Truth is, this one was already named "Kira" when I got her,
so I only had to paint over one letter.
It's about a 40-minute flight. -[gear cranks] -to the lodge.
Don't let the name "lodge" fool you.
You'll be surrounded by five-star luxury.
Cessna Mike India Alpha, East tie-down, departing runway 35, Lusaka.
translation.ko: 세스나 MIA, 동쪽 대기 중 35번 활주로에서 이륙하겠다

translation.en: We're flying over the oldest and largest game Reserve in Africa,
translation.ko: 아프리카에서 가장 넓고 오래된 사냥 금지 구역이에요

translation.en: Lion, leopard, rhino, cape buffalo, elephant.
translation.ko: 사자, 표범, 코뿔소, 버펄로 코끼리를 다 볼 수 있죠

translation.en: [Derek] Some people say it's the most dangerous animal out here.
I need you to stay in the plane.
Stay here? [stammers] What if you don't come back?
-It's Derek. You read me? -[man on walkie] Yes.
We have an orphan five kilometers southwest of N'goma.
translation.ko: - 얘기해 - 고아 코끼리 발견 은고마 남서쪽 5km

translation.en: You'll find us just north of where I landed the airplane. We'll need a truck.
translation.ko: 비행기 착륙 지점에서 북쪽이야 트럭이 필요해

translation.en: If we don't do something to help that baby, he'll be dead in two days.
translation.ko: 저 녀석을 돕지 않으면 이틀 안에 죽을 거예요

translation.en: I need you to talk to him,
stay right in front of him, keep his attention.
We gotta get him on his side, so he doesn't charge us. I got this.
translation.ko: 덤벼들지 않게 모로 눕혀야 해요 나한테 맡겨요

translation.en: Okay. I'll keep him calm, get some water out of my backpack.
translation.ko: 좋아요, 진정시킬 동안 배낭에서 물 좀 갖다줘요

translation.en: He needs to know that we're here to help him.
Nobody in the world needs ivory, except an elephant.
translation.ko: 아무도 상아가 필요하지 않아요 코끼리 빼고요

translation.en: What's going to happen to him?
We'll take him back to the shelter and nurse him back to health.
We didn't have great luck with the last one, but he looks like he's in a little better shape.
translation.ko: 최근 녀석은 운이 안 따랐는데 이 녀석은 상태가 나아 보여요

translation.en: Let's get you to the lodge.
[Derek] You'll be sipping martinis before sunset.
translation.ko: 일몰 전에 마티니 맛을 보게 해줄게요

translation.en: Listen, I know this is very emotional,
but there's nothing you can do.
translation.ko: 당신이 할 수 있는 일은 없어요

translation.en: [stammers] I haven't practiced in a while, and I mostly worked on dogs and cats,
translation.ko: 일을 쉰 지 오래됐고 개와 고양이가 주였지만

translation.en: but I really want to help.
What do you know about elephants?
[Kate] It's gonna be okay. It's gonna be all right, little baby.
translation.ko: 괜찮을 거야 다 잘될 거야, 아가

translation.en: He's in shock. The grief of losing his family.
translation.ko: 충격이 심해요 가족을 잃은 슬픔 때문이죠

translation.en: What can I do to help?
We have to make sure that he's hydrated and stays warm.
[Jonathan] We'll get this into his ear right here.
If he doesn't get up in a day's time,
We try and replicate life in the herd.
Each baby has a keeper, making sure they are never alone.
translation.ko: 새끼가 혼자 있는 일이 없도록 보육사를 배정하는데

translation.en: We also trade off, so the calves don't get too attached to one person,
translation.ko: 특정 코끼리만 아끼거나 특정 보육사만 따르지 않게

translation.en: When the elephants are ready to leave the nursery,
and at their own pace, which sometimes does take years,
translation.ko: 수년이 걸리기도 하지만 각자의 적응 속도를 따라

translation.en: they gradually make the transition back into the wild.
And these are our living quarters,
but most of us prefer to sleep with the elephants.
translation.ko: 대부분 코끼리와 같이 자는 걸 좋아해요

translation.en: How do the older elephants react to the babies you rescue?
translation.ko: 나이 든 코끼리는 구조된 새끼를 어떻게 대해요?

translation.en: Right now we have three babies,
She's practicing to be a matriarch.

translation.ko: 호기심이 끝이 없고 대장 노릇도 톡톡히 하죠

translation.en: [laughs] Well, Chuma, you have some New York in you!
[Jonathan] Elephants have all the emotions of humans.
A sense of humor and a sense of family.
Come. It's almost suppertime for the little ones.
We feed the babies separately from the adults.
That's Kasewe. We rescued him last week.
And that's Multisani. Oh, my gosh.

translation.ko: 새끼 중에 가장 나이 많고 아주 까탈스럽죠

translation.en: Why don't you get some rest?
The first tent on the end is yours,
and we take supper in the boma.
Jonathan said the tent on the end.
you live here, like, all the time?
Yeah, I fly the tourists to help us pay for the plane.
translation.ko: 네, 관광객 운반해서 비행기 유지비를 대죠

translation.en: Oh, I put your suitcase in your tent.
Forgive the mess. I'm not very good at folding.
Kinda opened up when I threw it on the bed.
-So you just went through my stuff? -No.
translation.ko: - 내 물건을 다 본 거네요? - 아뇨

translation.en: But I don't think you're gonna need those high heels here.
I don't want any more visitors.
[South African woman] No, no, no, no.
Tell him that Leslie Van Der Mere-Jones called, exclamation point!
translation.ko: 레슬리 판데르미어존스 전화라고 전해 느낌표 붙여서!

translation.en: -[Kate] These are beautiful! -[Derek] Come on, grab a plate.
translation.ko: 그림들이 멋져요 와서 요기 좀 해요

translation.en: And if you stay long enough,
the day after that, the day after that, and the day after that.
translation.ko: 모레도, 그다음 날에도 그다음 날에도 똑같죠

translation.en: I don't know. I didn't really mean to, but...
[stammers] I guess-- I guess life just happened.
So you supported your husband through school,
raised the kid, and then he left you?
Did I tell you all that?
And a lot about the ladies who lunch.
So you never get any of those type of surprises.
You don't wake up one day and someone doesn't love you anymore.
translation.ko: 갑자기 날 사랑하지 않는다며 폭탄선언을 하진 않아요

translation.en: I thought Africa was known for its good coffee.
translation.ko: 아프리카는 맛 좋은 커피로 유명하지 않나요?

translation.en: [Derek] Your first time under the southern sky?
We have a telescope at home
because Luke really loved it until he fell in love with music.
translation.ko: 루크가 음악에 빠지기 전까진 별에 빠졌었거든요

translation.en: What keeps them from coming into camp?
translation.ko: 캠프로 못 들어오게 할 방법은 있겠죠?

translation.en: Yup, tonight's my shift with the orphans.
Next time, don't walk alone out there. It's not safe.
I mean, it's safe, but not so safe.
You have made me the happiest woman in the world!
Thank you! I hear that a lot.
I think we're gonna need more milk.
[man over walkie] Derek, you got a pick-up from the lodge. Private tour.
-[walkie trills] -I'm on my way. Take good care of my elephant.
translation.ko: 바로 갈게, 내 코끼리 잘 부탁해요

translation.en: Nice to see you on your feet, young man!
translation.ko: 네 발로 선 걸 보니 반갑구나

translation.en: It appears that you have brought us good luck.
translation.ko: 케이트가 좋은 기운을 가져다준 것 같네요

translation.en: I did nothing. I did nothing.
translation.ko: - 고마워, 오스카 - 난 아무것도 한 게 없어요

translation.en: I think this little calf would disagree.
This is the biggest baby I've ever fed, definitely bigger than the last one.
translation.ko: 젖병 물려본 애 중에 제일 커요 마지막 녀석보다 더요

translation.en: Oh, you have children? I do. I have a son.
Then we shall call this one Manu.
[Kate] Oh, Manu, I hope you like your new name!
translation.ko: 마누, 새 이름이 맘에 들었으면 좋겠다

translation.en: How long have you lived with them?
translation.ko: 이 일을 한 지 얼마나 됐어요?

translation.en: My whole life, really. I grew up on the reserve.
He moved here when he was 16. Our fathers were game wardens together.
translation.ko: 열여섯에 이리로 왔죠 아버님들이 수렵 감시관이었어요

translation.en: I wish I could stay longer.
Oh, you know what? No one really calls me that.
Did you not earn the title?
The local vet comes around once a month, if we're lucky.
translation.ko: 현지 수의사는 한 달에 한 번 와요 그것도 운이 좋으면요

translation.en: You're hungry for your milk. I'll go get it.
-Good morning, Jonathan! -Good morning, Dr. Kate. Shift change.
translation.ko: - 좋은 아침, 조너선! - 좋은 아침이에요, 교대하죠

translation.en: You know, I could stay a little longer.
Better not. We don't want him missing you.
Your return ticket is for September 28th, right?
Time flies when you're out here.
Lookin' at your fancy African vacay pics?
This Christmas. It was supposed to be our Christmas card.
Hence the staged glamour of it all.
and you didn't get to go on your fancy five-star safari,
let me take you on one.
But with the value of five. [Kate] Well, okay.
-Sometimes I come out here to paint. -Mm-hm.
...when they're old enough, -will start mingling with the wild herd. -Mm.
translation.ko: 어느 정도 성숙하면 야생의 무리와 어울리기 시작해요

translation.en: And then they might start staying out for one or two nights at a time.
translation.ko: 한 번 나가면 하루나 이틀 밤을 밖에서 보내죠

translation.en: Chuma over there has been wandering off.
One night she's just gonna decide she's not coming home,
translation.ko: 어느 날 밤 안 돌아오기로 마음먹으면

translation.en: and from that time on, she'll be a wild elephant again.
-Don't you get sad when they leave? -I used to.
translation.ko: - 코끼리가 떠나면 슬프지 않아요? - 전엔 그랬지만

translation.en: But they're meant to live in the wild.
It's the empty nest syndrome. I guess it's everywhere.
[sighs] My son just left for college.
In a dorm room one state over,
Just because we don't see them doesn't mean that they're not still a part of us.
translation.ko: 아이들이 눈앞에 없어도 여전히 우리의 일부죠

translation.en: But it wasn't in the cards.
How long have you been divorced?
[stammers] I'm so sorry. No, it's okay.
She had a gallery in town.
And then she got ill, and when she passed...
When you first get married, you think, "Well, that's it.
translation.ko: 결혼할 당시엔 반쪽을 만난 줄 알고

translation.en: Everything is just gonna be fine now."
translation.ko: 모든 게 다 잘될 줄 알잖아요

translation.en: Now I've gotta go back home, and I don't know what I'm supposed to do with myself.
translation.ko: 당장 집으로 돌아가면 어떻게 살아야 할지도 모르겠어요

translation.en: Taking a second honeymoon with myself?
I'm good. How are you? How's school?
Well, I took a little detour,
and now I'm in this place surrounded by wild animals.
-[student] Hey, go long! Go long! -[laughing through screen]
chapati with tomato and goat cheese,
a.k.a. New York thin crust pizza.
Now this makes me wanna be a lady who lunches.
And I just wanna say to all of you, thank you,
because these last few weeks have meant more to me than you can ever know.
translation.ko: 상상도 못 할 만큼 뜻깊은 몇 주를 보냈거든요

translation.en: So even though I'm gonna be far away,
I want you to know that I'm never gonna forget any of you.
[Derek] You really have a telescope on the 15th floor?
The flickering lights of about a million TVs. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 약 백만 대의 TV가 깜빡대는 불빛요

translation.en: Come on. I wanna show you something.
Oh, I've already seen your tent.
I think you were looking at more than the tent.
you can look through your telescope at all the fabulous televisions,
This is Leslie Van Der Mere-Jones. She's with the foundation
translation.ko: 레슬리 판데르미어존스예요 우리를 후원하는 재단 사람이죠

translation.en: Well, it's late so I'm just going to head back to my tent.
I'll walk you back. [Kate] No, I know the way.
translation.ko: - 데려다줄게요 - 아뇨, 혼자 갈 수 있어요

translation.en: I never met someone with five last names.
translation.ko: 성이 그렇게 긴 사람은 처음 봤어요

translation.en: Now hang on! No, it's fine.
It's on me. I just should've stuck with my first impression.
You're lonely but you don't know it,
so you just use all your thing
to get what you need in the moment and you don't think about anybody else.
translation.ko: 당장 원하는 걸 얻는 데 급급해서 다른 사람은 안중에도 없죠

translation.en: [Jonathan] Well, someone doesn't want you to leave.
How long does it take her to pack?
-[Jonathan] She's not going. -What do you mean?
She told you that? Don't flatter yourself. It's not you.
translation.ko: - 그렇게 말했어? - 네 얘기 아니니 착각하지 마

translation.en: He has a gray trunk, weighs 600 pounds
and he has a drinking problem.
Yeah, I guess I never saw that coming.
Dear Luke, I know I've exceeded my weekly FaceTime allotment,
so I'm writing this email to tell you that
I have decided to stay out here a little longer.
translation.ko: 난 여기서 좀 더 지내기로 했단다

translation.en: -[upbeat Christmas song playing] -♪ Santa's coming to town, town ♪ ♪ And he's bringing joy For all the kids around, 'round ♪
♪ What took you so long? I needed you ♪
How are you today? Are you ready for your check-up?
translation.ko: 오늘 기분은 어때? 검사 한번 받아볼까?

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -[Jonathan] Come on. It's Christmas week!
Our families are almost here. Cheer up!
translation.ko: 가족들 거의 도착했으니까 인상 좀 펴

translation.en: But you will hear them. They are very loud. [chuckles]
[chuckles] I can't wait to meet them.
One day maybe we can meet your family, too.
translation.ko: 우리가 박사님 가족을 만날 날도 오겠죠

translation.en: but my son is gonna stay at college this year with his friends.
Dr. Kate, I realize that you're away from your family this Christmas,
translation.ko: 박사님, 이번 크리스마스엔 가족과 떨어져 지내지만

translation.en: but I want you to know that you're a part of ours now.
translation.ko: 우린 한 가족이라는 걸 알아줬으면 해요

translation.en: Go say hi to Uncle Derek.
You guys have gotten so big.
Hey, I wrestle elephants for a living. You're just a little rabbit to me.
translation.ko: 삼촌은 코끼리 다루는 사람이라 넌 기껏해야 토끼야

translation.en: Hi! Jonathan has written much about you.
So nice to finally meet you.
I'm Lulu, and this is my sister, Nia.
Oh, you guys are adorable! Let's get some treats! Let's go!
translation.ko: 너희 정말 귀엽다 간식 줄게, 들어가자!

translation.en: -[Aliyah] Hi, Derek! -Good to see you! How are you?
[Nia] Now you can look at this.
Ooh, I see this is a tent.
-[Kate] Who are these? -Oh, this one is you.
-[Kate] Oh! -And this one is Uncle Derek.
Well, I like it, but there's just one problem.
Is that handsome fellow supposed to be me?
And why is he missing a hand?
A Christmas delivery for you. -From you. -[Kate] Ah.
translation.ko: 크리스마스 소포 왔어요 직접 주문한 거네요

translation.en: Well, it isn't actually for me. -Well, you know, maybe just a little bit. -[paper tears]
translation.ko: 같이 쓰자고 주문했어요 나도 기분 좀 내고요

translation.en: I see you've done this before.
[chuckles] Only about twice a day for the last 20 years.
translation.ko: 기껏해야 지난 20년간 하루에 두 잔쯤 뽑았달까

translation.en: Oh, and did you read it, too?
-Hm. Does not look like a Christmas card. -[paper rustling]
Mr. Conrad is filing for divorce.
I'm gonna go see my elephant.
He seems to be doing fine.
You know, I always wanted more animals,
but Drew didn't want pet hair on his clothes.
translation.ko: 드루는 옷에 털이 묻는 걸 싫어했어요

translation.en: I mean, I just should've seen this coming. I...
Without change, there would be no butterflies.
I gotta go check on those cookies.
It's the holidays. Yeah. Of course.
Chuma must've opened the gate somehow, Manu followed.
translation.ko: 추마가 문을 열었나 본데 마누가 따라갔어요

translation.en: -I'll fly out first light to look for him. -First light is too late.
translation.ko: 동트자마자 항공 수색할 거예요 그때면 너무 늦어요 당장 찾아야 해요
그때면 너무 늦어요 당장 찾아야 해요

translation.en: -They'll take care of each other. -You don't know that.
translation.ko: - 서로 잘 돌볼 거예요 - 모르는 소리예요

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta let them wander.
But he's still just a baby. Anything could happen.
translation.ko: 아직 어려서 무슨 일이 생길지 몰라요

translation.en: Wait, what are you doing? Why are we stopping?
We've been at this for a while. Need to get some sleep.
It's as good a place as any.
But shouldn't we keep looking for them?
I lost Luke one time in a shopping mall. Christmas time.
translation.ko: 쇼핑몰에서 루크를 잃어버린 적 있어요 크리스마스 즈음에요

translation.en: Yeah, but there weren't any poachers in that mall.
Looks like you put on some pounds.
-Was smaller than Manu when I found him. -[door closes]
translation.ko: 이 녀석을 찾았을 땐 마누보다 더 작았죠

translation.en: We didn't think he'd make it.
How long have you known him?
What's it been, Roi? Nine, almost ten years?
I remember once Jonathan's father walked into the park,
an elephant came out of the bush to greet him.
translation.ko: 한 코끼리가 수풀에서 맞아주던 기억이 나요

translation.en: It'd been 37 years since they'd seen each other.
It was so nice to meet you!
[man over walkie] Hey, Derek, good news.
The rangers spotted our elephants. They're at that pond south of Kadma.
translation.ko: 야생동물 경비대가 녀석들을 봤대 카드마 남쪽의 연못이야

translation.en: Now this is a merry Christmas Eve!
[man over walkie] Hey, Derek. Got a last-minute pick-up for ya. -Come on back. -[static]
Well, it's not Christmas in Africa without goat stew.
a man cannot resist a good goat stew.
translation.ko: 남자는 맛 좋은 염소 스튜에 꼼짝 못 한다고

translation.en: I hear your friend Derek loves a good goat stew.
translation.ko: 당신 친구 데릭도 염소 스튜라면 사족을 못 쓴다던데

translation.en: -He and I, we're-- we're just friends. -Hm.
-Derek needs you at the air strip. -Why? Is he okay?
translation.ko: - 데릭이 활주로로 와달래요 - 왜요? 데릭은 괜찮아요?

translation.en: I picked you up a little holiday cheer for Christmas Eve.
translation.ko: 크리스마스이브에 기분 좀 내라고 선물을 싣고 왔죠

translation.en: Figured I'd check on you, make sure you're wearing a sweater.
translation.ko: 엄마가 스웨터 잘 입고 있나 확인해야겠더라고요

translation.en: Pleasure to meet Dr. Kate's first son.
What are you even doing here?
-He did? -Mm-hm. What about that music festival?
Yeah, we had to drop out. My finals schedule screwed everything up.
translation.ko: 포기했어요 기말고사 일정 때문에 다 망쳤죠

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna take this stuff back to the tent,
translation.ko: 난 짐을 숙소로 옮길 테니 회포 풀어요

translation.en: so you guys can catch up. Next time you fly, one hand on the yoke.
translation.ko: 난 짐을 숙소로 옮길 테니 회포 풀어요 다음에 조종할 땐 한 손은 요크에 올려야 해

translation.en: He let me push a few levers. Seems like a nice guy.
translation.ko: 레버 몇 개 밀어보게 하셨죠 괜찮은 분 같아요

translation.en: I wanted to name this one Sadie.
-♪ The silent stars go by ♪ -[Derek] Yeah!
You know, I haven't seen you do that in a long time.
If I've learned anything here, it's to not get too attached.
translation.ko: 내가 여기서 배운 게 있다면 너무 정 주지 말라는 거지

translation.en: Not everything has to end badly.
translation.ko: 다 안 좋게 끝나란 법은 없어

translation.en: It's not gonna end, 'cause it never really started.
Okay, everyone, let's take a picture together.
On three, everyone say Merry Christmas, all right?
I think I just found next year's Christmas card.
translation.ko: 내년 크리스마스 카드가 생긴 것 같아

translation.en: That beats the one we took in August. [laughs] It certainly does.
Well, it was really nice of your father to send you.
translation.ko: 널 보내다니 네 아빠가 좋은 일 했네

translation.en: How's he doing? He's okay, I guess.
translation.ko: - 어떻게 지낸대? - 잘 지내시는 것 같아요

translation.en: Got an apartment near the office.
The usual, [sighs] working, schmoozing clients. All that fun stuff.
translation.ko: - 크리스마스엔 뭐 한대? - 똑같죠, 뭐 일하고 고객과 수다 떨고 얼마나 재밌을까

translation.en: You know, I get why you don't want to come back.
translation.ko: 안 돌아오고 싶은 엄마 마음 이해해요

translation.en: Honey, I'm coming back. Mom, it's okay.
You and Dad never really liked the same things.
translation.ko: 엄마랑 아빠는 좋아하는 것도 너무 달랐어요

translation.en: The truth is, I'm surprised you stayed together as long as you did.
translation.ko: 그렇게 오래 같이 사신 게 놀랍다니까요

translation.en: it wasn't bad. It was just...
Remember when we brought home that stray dog, and Dad made us give him away?
translation.ko: 우리가 떠돌이 개를 주워왔을 때 아빠 때문에 못 길렀잖아요?

translation.en: Well, now you get to keep that stray dog.
Yeah, you know, Comet, Cupid, Blixen.
I don't usually let people peek at my doodles.
translation.ko: 난 습작은 공개 안 하는 편이에요

translation.en: Many times, even after they're done.
They teach you that in vet school?
Yeah, I've heard it called that.
I don't usually say that about humans.
translation.ko: 사람한테 이런 말 잘 안 해요

translation.en: And while we're in the Christmas spirit,
I should say that it hasn't been completely awful having you here either.
translation.ko: 당신이 여기에 온 것도 썩 나쁘지 않았죠

translation.en: you're really not as terrible as I thought you were at first.
[laughs] That is most definitely -not mistletoe. -That is African mistletoe.
And even though we're in Africa,
we still celebrate the same worldwide mistletoe traditions.
translation.ko: 우린 세계 공통의 겨우살이 전통을 따르죠
- 잘 자요 - 잘 자요, 뉴욕 씨

translation.en: You know, Freshman year is always a huge adjustment.
translation.ko: 신입생 땐 적응할 게 엄청 많지

translation.en: I'm sure it's going to get better.
Yeah, it's been a bit rough with the distance.
I don't mean to pry, but--
Please tell me those aren't what I think they are.
How else am I supposed to measure an elephant?
translation.ko: 그럼 내가 코끼리 키를 어떻게 재겠니?

translation.en: Come here. I'm so happy you're here.
translation.ko: 안아보자 - 네가 와서 얼마나 좋은지 몰라 - 나도요
- 네가 와서 얼마나 좋은지 몰라 - 나도요

translation.en: It's the best Christmas present ever.
Hey! Are you still Christmas shopping?
[Trish] I'm having Christmas lunch with Tabitha.
[sighs] I just could not face that empty apartment for the holidays.
translation.ko: 명절 동안 텅 빈 집구석에 있기 싫었어

translation.en: He flew in yesterday to surprise me!
translation.ko: 날 놀라게 해주려고 어제 도착했지 뭐야

translation.en: This year, it's gonna be Christmas in Africa.
And what is Christmas in Africa?
Well, I can't speak for the whole continent,
but here at the elephant orphanage,
they celebrate all week, and there's no shopping involved.
translation.ko: 크리스마스 주간 내내 파티하고 쇼핑은 전혀 안 해

translation.en: Well, you know what they say here?
they say, "When the time is right."
Okay. Now I'm really starting to worry.
Time goes so slowly out here.
I'm so proud of you, too!
Well, I hope you still feel that way after I tell you what I'm gonna tell you.
translation.ko: 그 마음 변치 않으면 좋겠네요 내가 어떤 말을 해도요

translation.en: I'm really not into the business major.
What do you want to study?
Now, see, that's not exactly it.
College is a waste of time for me.
And please don't say anything to Dad, I haven't told him yet.
translation.ko: 아빠한테는 비밀로 해줘요 아직 얘기 안 했으니까

translation.en: you cannot just drop out of college.
Well, you left for Africa with no return date, and look at you! You're happy!
translation.ko: 기약 없이 아프리카로 떠난 엄마도 이렇게 행복하잖아요

translation.en: Yeah, because I'm not waiting 20 years to do what I really wanna do.
translation.ko: 난 하고 싶은 일 하려고 20년을 기다리진 않을 테니까요

translation.en: Well, my kid kinda got me out of the Christmas spirit.
Why don't you wait till then to miss him?
translation.ko: 가고 나서 그리워해도 늦지 않을 텐데

translation.en: The problem is that he just announced that he's going to drop out of school,
translation.ko: 방금 나한테 폭탄선언을 했어요 대학을 중퇴하고

translation.en: play in a band, move in with his friends, and then write his own music in Starbucks.
translation.ko: 친구들과 살면서 밴드 활동 하고 스타벅스에서 곡을 쓰겠대요

translation.en: Isn't that how The Beatles started?
You don't understand! You don't even have kids!
translation.ko: 당신은 이해 못 해요 아이도 없으면서!

translation.en: [stammering] I'm just... I'm terrible company. I'm gonna go to bed.
All right, I want you to think about what I said, okay?
translation.ko: 내 말 잘 생각해 봐, 알겠지?

translation.en: I love you, Mom, but I'm not changing my mind.
-I love you so much. -I love you, too.
I'll text you when I land in Newark.
He's a good kid. He's gonna be fine.
I just feel guilty, you know?
I feel like I should've been there for him.
-I never meant to stay this long. -[exhales]
I know. You're gonna miss me.
-That's not even what I was gonna say. -Oh, you're not gonna miss me?
translation.ko: - 내가 하려던 말 아닌데 - 나 안 보고 싶을 거예요?

translation.en: [chuckles] It's okay, 'cause I'm gonna miss you.
I was going to surprise you with a Christmas present,
but now I'm not so sure.
I don't think I've seen you paint anything but scenery.
translation.ko: 풍경 말고 다른 걸 그린 건 처음 봐

translation.en: Thought I'd give something else a try.
How's that turning out for you?
So I guess not very well.
People come to see the animals, and then they go home.
translation.ko: 동물 구경 온 관광객은 결국 돌아가

translation.en: Come to Cape Town with me. We'll see out the holidays there.
translation.ko: 나랑 케이프타운으로 가 거기서 휴가를 보내자고

translation.en: Whatever this is we've been doing...
Well, I regret to inform you
that the board has decided to terminate funding as of the new year.
This isn't about us. This is about the elephants.
It's not about the bloody elephants for me.
-Jonathan will drive you. -Oh. You're not gonna--
I have some tourists I have to fly out.
Well, you'd better be nice to those tourists,
'cause you just don't know how they're gonna turn out.
If you come back here, I'll be here.
I guess I did see that one coming.
No. She's not returning my calls.
I'm thinking of flying down there,
talking to the board myself, see if I can get them to change their mind.
You remember what happened last time?
I will think before I speak
I really love animals, and I miss working with them so much.
translation.ko: 전 동물을 무척 사랑하고 함께한 순간들이 그리워요

translation.en: Yes, I know they're not your typical clientele,
but I'm also familiar with antelope, rhino
Thank you. Everyone calls me Dr. Kate.
I mean, you'd be getting a college degree, and you'd be doing something you love.
translation.ko: 학위도 따면서 좋아하는 일도 하는 거지

translation.en: I dunno. It's not really what I had in mind.
translation.ko: 모르겠어요 그건 생각해 본 적 없어서

translation.en: And it'd be really good for your musical career.
translation.ko: 네 음악 경력에도 도움이 될 거야

translation.en: I dunno. It's a lot to think about.
Can I have a night to sleep on it?
Of course, of course! Let's go get lunch.
He stays in college, but he studies something that he loves.
translation.ko: 대학을 계속 다니면서 좋아하는 걸 전공하는 거니까

translation.en: You're really okay with our son being...
You know, it's his passion! I mean, when else is he going to get to try it?
translation.ko: 애가 좋다잖아! 그럼 언제 또 해보겠어?

translation.en: When he's 50 and he's in a job that he hates?
translation.ko: 오십이 돼서 싫어하는 직업에 매였을 때?

translation.en: he is never going to be you.
We just have to help him be himself.
I know I said I wouldn't worry, but...
Good. [stammers] And how are you? How is everyone?
Derek wouldn't want me to say anything. But...
translation.ko: 데릭이 아무 말 하지 말라고 했지만...

translation.en: Derek got some emergency funding from another foundation,
translation.ko: 데릭이 다른 재단에서 비상 기금을 받긴 했지만

translation.en: but if we don't figure out something long-term and soon,
translation.ko: 장기적인 기금 대책을 곧 마련하지 못하면

translation.en: I don't think we'll last much past June of next year.
Well, no, no, no, that can't happen!
Looks like we don't need the foundation.
Not for a very long time.
[Jonathan] At least not until next Christmas.
-[Derek] How are you? -[man] Hi, how are you?
All right, what is this? Is it a thorn?
-[door opens] -[woman] King Charles in room needs a teeth cleaning,
translation.ko: 2번 방의 킹 찰스는 치석 제거 대기 중이고

translation.en: Wait, that is the third time this week!
And may I say that's a very nice sweater!
What are you in for? Just a nail clip.
And a refill on her antidepressants.
[stammers] Just give me one second, okay?
Is that how we're doing things now?
Maybe I should get you a bottle, cheer you up a bit.
I have a pick-up. You want anything?
translation.ko: 관광객 태우러 갈 건데 필요한 거 있어?

translation.en: Are we up for some poker tonight?
Taking some tourist into the bush.
Two weeks ago, I sold my apartment.
Two days ago, I bought a one-way ticket.
And two minutes ago, I walked in here after a very long journey.
translation.ko: 2분 전엔 긴 여정을 마치고 여기 도착했죠

translation.en: Well, I hope you're ready for another one.
-[wistful music playing] -[Kate] Manu, I'm really gonna miss you.
translation.ko: 마누, 네가 정말 보고 싶을 거야

translation.en: I'm gonna think about you every day,
and I want you to know not to be scared out there.
You're gonna do great because you are smart
translation.ko: 넌 잘 해낼 거야 왜냐하면 넌 영리하고

translation.en: and you are brave. Okay, baby?
Go live your life, all right?
And now I let him go just like that?
